message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to let it go for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but I'm only willing to pay $120. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand it's a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $160. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Alice,  I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $160 is still a little out of my range.  I'm happy to pay $130, which is a fair compromise. Let me know if you're willing to go that low.
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $130 is a good one, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I can offer it to you for $145. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work, but $145 is still above my budget. If you're willing to come down to $135, I'm happy to close the deal.  Otherwise, I'm going to have to look elsewhere.
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to make this work, but I'm not willing to go as low as $135. I can offer it to you for $140. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
